short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Enables quick access to the backyard screen, 'chrome://' and 'about:' pages.
short.ja: GoogleChromeの管理機能（'chrome://'や'about:'でアクセスするようなページ）への迅速なアクセスを可能とします。

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Backend Chrome Extension
========================

Enables quick access to the backyard screen, 'chrome://' and 'about:' pages.

Chrome Web Store
https://chrome.google.com/webstore/detail/eiingmhoibigiplopcmepmahoihedjnk


ABILITY
-------
- chrome://settings/clearBrowserData
- chrome://settings/siteData
- chrome://settings/content/cookies
- chrome://chrome-urls/
- chrome://settings/content
- chrome://settings/languages
- chrome://settings/
- chrome://extensions/
- https://chrome.google.com/webstore/category/extensions
- https://chrome.google.com/webstore/category/themes
- https://chrome.google.com/webstore/category/apps
- chrome://downloads
- chrome://history/
- chrome://bookmarks
- chrome://components
- chrome://cache
- chrome://dns
- chrome://network
- chrome://histograms
- chrome://version
- chrome://flags
- chrome://settings/help/



CHANGE LOG
----------

https://github.com/tetsuwo/backend-chrome.ext/blob/master/CHANGELOG.md


ELSEWHERE
---------

- Bugs and Issues https://github.com/tetsuwo/backend-chrome.ext/issues
  ... Report Bugs and Issues


AUTHOR
------

Tetsuwo OISHI - 
tetsuwo.oishi@gmail.com / http://fb.me/tetsuwo / http://twitter.com/tetsukamp
long.ja:
'chrome://' や 'about:' ページへ素早くアクセスできます。

Abilities:
  ✔ 拡張機能管理 (chrome://extensions)
  ✔ ダウンロード管理 (chrome://downloads)
  ✔ 閲覧履歴管理 (chrome://history)
  ✔ ブックマーク管理 (chrome://bookmarks)
  ✔ プラグイン管理 (about:plugins)
  ✔ キャッシュ一覧 (about:cache)
  ✔ メモリー使用量 (about:memory)
  ✔ DNS統計情報 (about:dns)
  ✔ クラッシュ画面 (about:crash)
  ✔ ハングアップ (about:hang)
  ✔  (about:internets)
  ✔  (about:histograms)
  ✔  (about:version)
  ✔  (Themes gallery page)

Languages:
  ✔ English
  ✔ 日本語

Change Log:
  0.1.6
    - オプション設定追加。
    - 言語対応修正。
  0.1.4
    - 拡張機能名変更。
  0.1.3
    - 拡張機能名変更。
  0.1.2
    - chrome://downloads, chrome://history, chrome://bookmarksを追加。
  0.1.1
    - 言語選択機能追加.
  0.1.0
    - 公開。
  0.0.1
    - 開発開始

Developed by Tetsuwo Oishi - http://twitter.com/_tetsuwo
